description: OPCXtra is an isotonic antioxidant supplement that delivers a potent blend of six bioflavonoids plus Vitamin C, Vitamin E and Potassium. It tastes great and is readily utilized by your body.
What is an OPC?

Oligomeric Proanthocyanidins (OPC), are a group of antioxidant bioflavonoids. Bioflavonoids are complex organic plant compounds found in fruits and vegetables. Our bioflavanoids include Grape Seed Extract, Red Wine Extract, Pine Bark Extract, Green Tea Extract, Bilberry Extract and Citrus Extract.
What is an isotonic OPC formula?

Unlike some pills and tablets, an isotonic OPC is 100% water soluble, and completely bioavailable. This combination allows this powerful antioxidant drink to quickly leave the stomach and move to the small intestines in as little a five minutes, where it can be rapidly absorbed by your bodies cells for immediate use.
What are the benefits of using OPCXtra?

Antioxidants are the superhero’s in the fight against free radicals in your body. Free radicals are unstable atoms in your body that damage cells. Antioxidants fight free radicals by capturing them in your cells to remove them from your body.
